_description: Gospel for Friday after the Second Sunday after Trinity in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint Iohn witnes wele alwaysHow crist to his desciples sais…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …To gader samen þe werldes gudeþat rises and falles als dose þe flode
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Cum autem inducent uos & cetera.”
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.282-284.
